page.title: 05Mattingley Area - Government
page.content: The block falls entirely within the {Hart District}of N.E. Hampshire & consists of most of the{Parish of {Mattingley,}a large part of the{Parish {of Hartley Wintney}& parts of the {Parishes of Rotherwick, Heckfield {Bramshill & Hook.}The{Parish Council} deals with minor local issues & the District Council collects refuse & approves plans. Heckfield, Mattingley & Rotherwick are grouped together & form the{Whitewater Ward}on Hart District Council. The representative on Hampshire County Council for the Hook/Yateley area (a Conservative) lives in Mattingley.{Public Services} are supplied by{Southern Gas}(where there is gas),{Mid Southern Water {Company & Southern Electricity Board.} The nearest{Fire Station}is at Hartley Wintney & the{Ambulance Depot {(& hospital)}is at Basingstoke.
